task_description:
This is the user's current request of changes to be made:
change the color of the button to not to brown

This is the user's previous chat history with this AI:

AI: Sure, I am working on changing the button color.
User: turn this into a tetris widget

This is the user's current request of changes to be made:
turn this into a tetris widget

This is the user's previous chat history with this AI:
The user requested to change one of the buttons to say "hadoken." The AI affirmed this request and provided a series of questions to clarify their preferences. The user was asked which button they would like to change—the main action button or a secondary action button—and whether they had a color preference for the "hadoken" button, with options of blue or green. Throughout the conversation, the user was presented with lists of additional features, including options for button color customization, button animation, hover effects, and sound effects for button presses. The AI consistently acknowledged the user's wishes and indicated that it would proceed with updating the button text to "hadoken." The user continued to confirm the request, and the AI reiterated its understanding by confirming the text change.
AI: Sure, I am working on changing the button color.
AI: Okay, I'll work on creating a Tetris widget for you.
User: turn this into a tetris widget
AI: Okay, I'll change the button text to "Hadoken."

This is the user's current request of changes to be made:
change one of the buttons to say hadoken

This is the user's previous chat history with this AI:
The user requested to change one of the buttons to say "hadoken." The AI responded by asking the user two questions: which button they would like to change (the main action button or a secondary action button) and their color preference for the button (blue or green). The AI acknowledged the user's request to change the button text to "hadoken." This sequence repeated multiple times with the AI consistently affirming the action after the user expressed the request. Additionally, the user was presented with various feature options, which included adding a Tetris widget, customizing button color options, highlighting buttons on hover, and implementing tooltips to explain button functions. The user confirmed checking certain features while others remained unchecked, indicating their preferences for additional functionalities. Throughout the conversation, the AI maintained a prompt and responsive attitude towards the user's requests and inquiries.
AI: Sure, I am working on changing the button color.
AI: Okay, I'll work on creating a Tetris widget for you.
User: turn this into a tetris widget
User: change the hadoken button to say shoryouken

change the hadoken button to say shoryouken
